activation.condition: When you hit an enemy with a melee trick attack that targets their KAC

description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

You’re able to use the momentum of your attacks to swap places with your targets. When you hit an enemy with a melee trick attack that targets their KAC, you can forgo the effects of your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.bhSrjkuWxz2DQHXC]{Debilitating Trick (Ex)} or the damage of your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.MBNI94tbMoqizPUk]{Trick Attack (Ex)} (your choice) to instead switch places with your target. This movement doesn’t provoke attacks of opportunity and can’t be used to move a creature into a hazardous space. You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.Suznr1WSCjd8lRMo]{Uncanny Mobility (Ex)} exploit to learn this exploit.
